channel.description: Recent content in Bigdata on Haowen`s Blog

item.title: Overview of COMP9313 Big Data Magement
item.description: “Big data is a field that treats ways to analyze, systematically extract information from, or otherwise deal with data sets that are too large or complex to be dealt with by traditional data-processing application software” ​ —— Wikipedia Week 1: Characterizing Big Data The 3 Vs of Big Data Volume Challenges for traditional IT infrastructures Large amounts of data,

item.title: MapReduce Case--Tablejoin
item.description: Case Specification There are two tables and both of them have the same foreign key. join in hadoop, is similar with the join in database. The first table, students.txt, is a text file, each row shows a student’s zid and his/her name, as shown below. z1 Sara z2 Ali The second table, marks.txt, is a text file, each row shows a student’s zid and two marks for his/her assignments.

item.title: MapReduce Case--Movie pair and users' ratings
item.description: Assignment Specification In this assignment we will be working on the processing of a Movie dataset: In this dataset, each row contains a movie rating done by a user (e.g., user1 has rated Titanic as 10). Here is the format of the dataset: user_id::movie_id::rating::timestamp In this assignment, for each pair of movies A and B, you need to find all the users who rated both movie A and B.
